// EFFECTIVE UNTIL DECEMBER 31, 2022 PER CHAPTERS 340 AND 341 OF 2012 //
The Office of Health Care Quality shall provide aggregate incident data to the Committee once every 3 months.
When providing aggregate incident data to the Committee, to the extent practicable, the Office of Health Care Quality shall identify trends and patterns that may threaten the health, safety, or well-being of an individual.
The Committee shall review the aggregate incident data and make findings and recommendations to the Department on system quality assurance needs.
The Committee may consult with experts as needed to carry out the provisions of this section.
